Isn't it funny how good friends start to seem like each other? Really makes you think,
Wow, it's so cool that the two of you have overcome such wildly different tastes to become friends. I guess it really is like they say que sera sera! That's German for "opposites attract," I think.
No? I guess I thought that you guys were really close, since you're here visiting the island and all
Oh, weird We've got to do something about that!I bet you two would go together like and .
One thing you should know is that is totally obsessed with !If you were to bring up , I bet you two will be up all night long, just chatting away.

If I were you, I'd start talking about next time you run into each other. Like me, is something of a gourmet, so that conversation could go on for a while.
Here's an idea! Why don't you tell about how you want to be ? Sure, it might be a lie, but bonding over a shared dream is a great way to start a friendship.

Actually, I'm getting a strong vibe from you. And believe it or not that's 's dream job! So maybe you can say that it's your dream too, and BOOM! BFFs! Sure, it might be a lie, but bonding over a shared dream is a great way to start a friendship.
Let's think I bet you and would really bond over . Do you know anything about it?<10_4 /> Eh, that doesn't matter.If you bring up , will take over the conversation from there.

Do you have any special skills?<10_4 /> Because is great when it comes to . There. I think that's your "in."

Got any special skills?<10_4 /> is a true master of . Why don't you get a little contest going and see who wins?What starts as a healthy competition could turn into a lifelong feud—uh<10_4 /> I meant friendship!
Now doesn't really have a favorite type of music.Maybe you could make some suggestionsthen before you know it, you'll be singing in harmony!
So, as far as I know, does not have a favorite book. Which means you have the perfect opportunity to swoop in and show off your literary prowess. Assuming you have literary prowess, .
If has a favorite comic book, that information has not been shared with me. Not that I take it personallyMaybe if you bring up the subject, you'll have better luck getting some info out of 'em, !
I'd suggest you hit it off by talking about movies, but unfortunately, doesn't have one. Pro tip—any movie I'm in should be your favorite movie. Ha HA!
My go-to ice breaker is always, "What's your favorite TV show?"But you won't have any luck using that with .When it comes to television, has no opinion.To be honest, I find it to be a bit unnerving,
doesn't really have a sport of choice.So I say you suggest a quick pick-up game of and see if you hit it off, ! I'll just be over here until you're all done with that.
Why not ask to hang out sometime and knock back a few glasses of ? Or or . doesn't really have a favorite drink, so I guess any beverage is fair game.
Let's see How can we get you two in the same room?I know! How about I host a -eating competition! I make an excellent emcee. doesn't have a favorite food, but you'll both dislike after that!
Based on our conversations, I'd say that doesn't have any aspirations at the moment. Well, other than to emulate me in every way, .You seem like a go-getter. Maybe you could inspire to dream big!
isn't too picky when it comes to activities and is generally up for anything. Maybe the two of you should get together and just do something random, like . It could spark a new interest!
If I were you, I'd encourage to develop a special skill with you, . Nothing builds a friendship faster than a positive shared experience well, other than a negative one.
